brief_title: A Study Evaluating Megestrol Acetate Modulation in Hormone Receptor Positive Advanced Breast Cancer
drugs: ['Megestrol Acetate 160Mg Tablet', 'Anastrozole 1Mg Tablet', 'Letrozole 2.5Mg Tablet', 'Exemestane 25 MG', 'Tamoxifen 20Mg Tablet', 'Fulvestrant 50Mg Solution for Injection']
inclusion_criteria:
inclusion criteria: 

 Metastatic breast cancer with ER and/or PR positive (primary tumor) 

 Metastatic site amenable to biopsy
exclusion_criteria:
: 

 Platelet count below 100,000 / mm3 

 Renal or hepatic impairment 

 Coagulation disorder
brief_summary: This pilot trial evaluates in vivo megestrol acetate (MA) modulation of steroidal receptors in advanced breast cancer.
